name: To Tell the Truth
storyline:
Take up the story of a cyber-sleuth investigating a case about a woman and her boyfriend who has been acting strange. Using your spyware program, Eyes On Me, you can watch what he has been up to through videos recorded from his laptop and transmitted to you.

He says he's been working late, but is that all there is to it?
What is making her worry so much and Is there even anything to worry about?
Can you get the whole picture and tell her the truth?

Using your spyware software, you'll be able to search through secretly recorded videos and see what's causing this man's girlfriend to act so suspiciously. Search through the database of collected videos using selective keywords heard by the computer and check the videos to learn about what is going on in his life. Look deep though, as some videos may be deceptively longer than you expected and new keywords may pop up the more you see.
summary: A non-linear FMV detective story following Marcus and his story to help his girlfriend understand why he's been acting so strange.
